featured.text: At the Book Fair, exhibitors from 21 countries will _______ textbooks, novels, and comic books.

definition.zh_def: 參展者，指在展覽會上展示產品或服務的個人或公司。
definition.en_def: An exhibitor is a person or company that displays products or services at an exhibition.
definition.example: The exhibitor showcased their latest technology at the trade fair.
